pages.text: Hello, $(playername) and welcome to the $(l)Elemental Guide!$()$(br)As you may have already read on the landing page, this book will help you on your journey!$(br2)This mod adds $(thing)amulets$() - powerful necklaces that grant their holder cool abilities!

$(fire)Fire-resistance$(), $(#bfff00)jump-boost$(), $(water)speed-boost$(), $(#ff00ff)pacifying$(), $(#ff69b4)healing$(), etc...$(br2)Also it adds something $(k)mysterious$() to your world... $(br)But you will learn about it later
